author: kwright
msg: Implement local objects to allow a single LCF process to run without using a synchdirectory.  This is, once again, meant to help LCF run as a single process for executing tests.

msg: DERBY-4692: Forbid UNIONs between BOOLEAN and non-BOOLEAN types, per the SQL Standard.
